description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Ty Smith- Android Engineer at Uber

ABSTRACT
In this talk, Ty will walk you through using Kotlin with Gradle and Android to streamline your workflow for app development, both within the build tool phase and within the application itself. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7712

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
